price: Katakanlah, "Berimanlah kamu kepadanya atau tidak usah beriman (sama saja bagi Allah).  Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang diberi pengetahuan sebelumnya apabila Al-Qur`ān dibacakan kepada mereka, mereka menyungkur atas muka mereka sambil bersujud,
arabic: قُلۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِهِۦٓ أَوۡ لَا تُؤۡمِنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦٓ إِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ يَخِرُّونَۤ لِلۡأَذۡقَانِۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul āminū bihi aw lā tu'minū inna alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma min qablihi idhā yut'lā ʿalayhim yakhirrūna lil'adhqāni sujjadan
